page.title: 05LEISURE
page.content: Affluence and increased leisure time mean more people pursue more acti- -vities.T.V. watching is still the most important activity allied to the hire of video films from local retail outlets.Going out for a drink/meal is increasingly popular and there are many public houses and restaurants in the area. Active sports e.g. football,bowls and tennis are still played in local recreational areas and cricket is very popular with local ethnic groups. Indoor activities include social clubs where indoor games e.g.cards,dominoes and snooker take place-sometimes for money. Keep fit centres have been enjoying a boom recently whilst sports such as squash and golf have relaxed class barriers being played by people from all walks of life.
